title: Walrus

fields.name: Atrributes:
fields.value:
-send a youtube link that the host posts
-Everyone will rate the content of the link from 1-10
-the mean vote (rounded down) gets  to choose between a one shot doc,one shot tracker or one shot roleblock for the next night; if more than half the current players are the mean vote; they all get hit with a basic shot at the end of the night

desc:
Post 3251
Abilities
-One per day, can pm the host to start a walrus the next night
